title: fried tomatoes, aubergine and courgette and sauce vierge
ingredients: 1 x 200g/7oz lamb fillet, fully trimmed, a pocket cut into the side using a sharp knife
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tomatoes, peeled, seeds removed, finely chopped
1 small sprig fresh rosemary, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
